NG0500:1: sgo rang gi mig gnyis na phar 'thon no //
NG0500:2: de'i dus su sems dang ye shes rgyab gyes so //
NG0500:3: de'i tshe dus ma 'gyur bar snang ba 'gyur bar snang nas //
NG0500:4: sa rdo ri brag rtsi shing nags tshal thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa /
NG0500:7: rang bzhin gyis bkrag nyam nga ba /
NG0500:8: phyi'i rgya mtsho mthong ba bzhin /
NG0500:9: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brdal nas 'ong bas /
NG0500:10: de la ma 'jigs shig / rig pa 'dzin pa
NG0500:11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa zhag lngar 'char ro
NG0500:12: // thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba rang
NG0500:13: gi rang gdang chos dbyings dag pa'i ngang du thim
NG0500:14: // mo // dag pa'i snang bar shes pas sangs rgyas so //
NG0500:15: khams gsum gyi sems can gyis ye shes kyi snang ba yang nas yang du mthong kyang */
NG0500:16: ngo ma shes pas na 'khor bar 'khyams so //
NG0500:17: gsang ba'i bdag po dbugs chad pa dang */
NG0500:18: ye shes kyi snang ba shar dus mnyam mo //
NG0500:19: yul gyi blo rdol ba yin pas /
NG0500:20: yul thams cad ye shes kyi snang bar shar nas 'ong ngo *//
NG0500:21: chos nyid dag pa zhag lngar shar ba de rang gi rig pa'i gdangs sam rang 'od yin no //
NG0500:22: de ngo shes par gyis shig / gsang ba'i bdag
NG0500:23: po mi dbul pos nor bu rin po che btsal
NG0500:24: kyang mi rnyed na dran pas lta ci smos /
NG0500:25: rigs kyi bu rang dbugs chad pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa /
NG0500:26: me long gi ngos la nyi ma shar ba lta bu dus gcig la 'char ro //
NG0500:27: de'i dus su 'od mthing ka mthong ba'i tshe na //
NG0500:28: 'di ka rag gi rig pa ngo bo stong pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su shes pas //
NG0500:29: rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NG0500:30: 'od ser po mthong ba'i tshe / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes su shes pas /
NG0500:31: rin chen 'byung ldan yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NG0500:33: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes su ngo shes pas
NG0500:34: / snang ba mtha' yas yab yum 'khor dang bcas
NG0500:37: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes su ngo shes pas /
NG0500:38: don yod grub pa yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NG0500:39: gsang ba'i bdag po dag snang shar bas //
NG0500:41: de dran pas sangs rgyas thob bo //
NG0500:42: 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa'i mis bza' btung mi bsam //
NG0500:43: zas dran pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NG0500:44: bla / zhes dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis gsungs so
NG0500:45: // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'dus ma byas yin la /
NG0500:46: byas pa'i chos kyis 'grub na 'dus byas su 'gyur ro //
NG0500:47: bde gshegs ye shes lus can de //
NG0500:48: rang las byung zhing rang gis shes //
NG0500:49: rang ni de nyid du grol lo / mthong byed kyis mthong @#//
NG0500:50: nas shes byed kyi shes so //
NG0500:52: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NG0500:53: 'byung ba dang snyigs 'byed pa'i dus su //
NG0500:54: rang gi snying gi dkyil nas ye shes gnas steg pas //
NG0500:55: gdangs phyir nas rang gi rig pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du yod pas /
NG0500:56: rang gi snying nang nas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes mthing kha'i rang bzhin du gnas so //
NG0500:57: me long lta bu'i ye shes kha dog dkar por yod do //
NG0500:58: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kha dog ser por gnas so //
NG0500:59: so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kha dog dmar por gnas so //
NG0500:60: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kha dog ljang khur gnas pa'o //
NG0500:61: de ltar rig pa ye shes lnga'i kha dog tu gnas pas /
NG0500:62: rang gi snying nang na 'od kha dog lnga me re re yod do //
NG0500:63: sems ni glo ba'i nang na yod do //
NG0500:64: glo ba dwangs snying ni rtsa sog ma'i sbu gu tsam gyis sbrel nas yod do //
NG0500:65: sems glo ba'i nang nas 'thon te /
NG0500:66: rtsa sog ma'i sbu gu tsam de'i nang na yar dbugs 'gyus pas //
NG0500:67: snying nang na yar sku gsum ye shes lnga bzhugs pa dang 'phrad do //
NG0500:68: rang gi snying gi dkyil du rig pa dbugs kyi rta dang 'phrad pas /
NG0500:69: dbugs med pa'i 'gyu ba zhes bya'o //
NG0500:70: tha ma rgyab gyes pa'i tshul ni / rang 'chi
NG0500:71: ba'i dus su sems glo ba'i nang nas 'thon te
NG0500:72: / lam gro sog gi sbu gu tsam sna bug gnyis //
NG0500:73: kha dang gsum nas ha zer te dbugs par 'gyu'o //
NG0500:74: tha ma hu zer nas nang du 'dren no //
NG0500:75: gsang ba'i bdag po / srid pa'i ri bo las rgal ba'i dus su /
NG0500:76: srog rgyu ba'i rlung nang nas phyir 'dren la stobs che /
NG0500:77: 'dus pa'i nam mkha' la phyir 'dren pa'i stobs che /
NG0500:78: nang du 'dren pa'i rlung gis phyi'i nam mkha' nas
NG0500:79: tshur 'dus thugs rig pa'i ye shes la thim mo
NG0500:80: // phar 'phros te 'dus ma byas pa'i nam mkha' la thim pas /
NG0500:81: rnam par rlung zhon gyi dgongs pa zhes bya ba'o //
NG0500:82: tha ma ha zer nas phar la song ste /
NG0500:83: hu zer nas tshur ma 'dus pa'i tshe /
NG0500:84: rang gi mdun gyi nam mkha' la ye shes kyi mthongs zhes bya ba /
NG0500:85: 'od kha dog lnga bkra lam me snang ngo *//
NG0500:86: de ngo shes pas lcags la gser 'gyur rtsibatang ba 'am /
NG0500:87: mun khung du sgron me bteg pa ltar skad cig la yar gyi zang thal du grol lo //
NG0500:88: rigs kyi bu nang dbugs dang ma bral ba la
NG0500:0: [(]8[)]@#// rtsa dar dkar skud pa tsam gyi nang na yar song nas //
NG0500:89: / rdo rje sems dpa'i sna thag kyang bya /
NG0500:90: thugs rje rgyun gyi sna thag kyang bya ste /
NG0500:91: rang gi mig nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la /
NG0500:92: 'od kha dog lnga thag pa brkyang ba 'am //
NG0500:93: skas btsugs pa ltar snang ngo *//
NG0500:94: de'i dus su shes pa rang gi mig la gtad /
NG0500:95: mig thugs rje rgyun mi 'chad pa'i thag pa //
NG0500:96: 'od kha dog lnga la gtad pas / yar gyi zang thal la grol lo //
NG0500:97: yang na thugs rje'i 'od kha dog lnga shar ba'i tshe /
NG0500:98: ye shes lnga ldan gyi dkyil 'khor thob nas //
NG0500:99: dbugs ma chad pa la sangs rgya'o //
NG0500:102: gsang ba'i dbang rdzogs pa la ston cig ces bka' stsal to //
NG0500:104: sems ye shes su bstan pa'i le'u /
NG0500:105: a+thi+-i //  / dpe'i ngo sprod pa la gsum ste /
NG0500:106: shel dang nyi ma 'dra 'bag gsum / shel te
NG0500:107: rdo rje sems dpa'i me long yin / de'i phyir
NG0500:108: shel la mig bcug nas bltas pas /
NG0500:109: sangs rgyas kyi rang lus 'od kyi phung po la /
NG0500:110: 'od kha dog lnga phra la dwangs pa /
NG0500:112: rang bzhin gyis bkrag la nyam nga ba /
NG0500:113: kha dog lnga tse re re /
NG0500:115: de dag ye shes kyi snang ba yin no //
NG0500:116: de bzhin du rang gi rig pa'i rang gdangs 'od kha dog lnga ldan du yod do //
NG0500:117: rang gi rig pa'i rang 'od ngo shes par byas la /
NG0500:118: rang 'od la ma yengs par blta'o //
NG0500:119: de ni dag snang lta ba'i yang lta ba yin no //
NG0500:120: nyi ma la ngo sprod pa ni /
NG0500:121: mig gi steng du ther ma skab la blta'o //
NG0500:122: de la 'od zer mtshon cha'i rtse mo 'phro ba bzhin du 'byung ste //
NG0500:123: de nyi ma phyed la bltas pas 'khrul snang dag snang du 'char ro //
NG0500:125: zhing khams nyi ma la bzhag nas shel la bltas pas /
NG0500:126: longs sku kha mig rna ba can du 'char ro //
NG0500:127: de ji lta ba bzhin du bar do longs sku'i snang ba 'char tsa na /
NG0500:128: rang snang du ngo shes par de nyid du grol 'gro'o //
NG0500:129: dpe'i ngo sprod kyis don la phab bo //
NG0500:130: don gyi ngo sprod kyis don la thag chod /
NG0500:131: snang ba sna tshogs su 'char yang rang snang rang
NG0500:132: byung yin pas / tha chod rang la gyis shig / 'di phyi gnyis su med de /
NG0500:133: blo 'das rtsol med du grol lo //
NG0500:134: lan cig dus kyi tha ma la /
NG0500:135: skal ldan las 'phro can dang 'phrad nas 'di la longs spyod shog / ces gsungs so //
